content: knitted vest for men in drops air the piece is worked bottom up in stocking stitch pattern ai-422 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops air from garnstudio 250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 03 pearl grey **needles ** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 17 stitches and 22 row in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
